name: S.A.D Force
description:
S.A.D Force

The year is 3021, Earth is now a utopia, world hunger is a thing of the past, and illness has all but been eliminated thanks to advances in technology due to man’s desire for war being a thing of the past.

Scientists on Earth’s new artificial moon have detected a signal coming from deep space, it is not human…

Frantically trying to discover the source of this signal, Earth’s top minds discover a message embedded in the signal, a declaration of war!

Orbital satellites find a massive force on a trajectory to the Sol system.

How will we defend against this? We have no weapons.

Scientists begin retrofitting 2 ancient space fighters, code-named Sword and Spear, housed in the Capitol Museum with the newest technology and advanced weapons they can create and begin production on a 3rd ship known as The Spartan, a prototype dual weapon fighter with the capabilities of both Sword and Spear models.

 These ships will be known as Phalanx.

Setting off from Earth just days from the enemy armada, our only hope is these ships and their brave pilots. 

CONTROLS 

 In-Game pause: Esc

*Single Player* Movement: W,S,A,D Fire Green Laser: C Fire Red Laser: V

 

*Multiplayer* P1 Movement: W,S,A,D Fire Red Laser: C P2 Movement: Arrow Keys Fire Green Laser: M
